title: Web Development Fundamentals
caption: Learn the basics of HTML and CSS to create static websites and a one-page personal website.

title: Introduction to Python
caption: Python is an increasingly popular language. This workshop will provide you with a good grasp of the fundamentals.

title: Introduction to Java
caption: Learn the basics of Java, one of the most used programming languages, and apply them to practice problems.

title: Django Framework
caption: Learn how to build a Django backend for a to-do app.

title: Introduction to JavaScript
caption: Learn the basics of JavaScript and make a static website interactive.

title: Introduction to React
caption: Learn the fundamentals of React by building the front-end for a to-do list app.

title: Introduction to Open Source Contribution
caption: Learn how to make quality contributions to open source, including intermediate git functionality and project selection.

title: Unit Testing
caption: Learn to write tests for individual functions using Python's unittest library and advanced testing techniques.

title: Functional Programming with OCaml
caption: Learn a functional programming language that aligns with natural human thinking and ensures code reliability.

title: Intro to IDEs
caption: Learn about popular development tools and how they aid in writing maintainable code.

title: GitHub 101
caption: An interactive workshop on GitHub basics, including personal and collaborative use.

title: Command Line Fundamentals
caption: Cover essential skills for command line work, including navigation, file editing, and script writing.

title: Personal Web Deployment
caption: Learn how to host personal websites for free using GitHub Pages.

title: Data Science Basics
caption: Learn to solve data problems from start to finish and explore statistical analysis.

title: Networking 101
caption: Best practices for networking to secure high-demand roles in tech, finance, and consulting.

title: Blockchain 101
caption: Understand blockchain technology and its potential impact.
